text: De Press are a Polish-Norwegian rock band (or music group). It started in 1980. Its first members were Jørn Christensen, Ola Snortheim, while Andrej Nebb is still a member. In 1981 the band won the award Spellemannprisen, class "New rock". In 2011, Morgenbladet, a Norwegian newspaper, gave a ranking of the 100 best albums ever; Block to Block (1981) was chosen for the 10th place.* Morgenbladet topp 100 They have played concerts in Norway, as late as 2019.https://underdusken.no/kultur-musikk/jeg-har-hatt-samleie-med- fiskepudding/155457. Retrieved 20 July 2021https://www.itromso.no/feedback/intervju/2017/07/20/%E2%80%93-Det-er-en- helt-genial-plate-15034848.ece . 20 July 2017. Retrieved 20 July 2021 The members are * Andrej Nebb, singerhttps://www.disharmoni.no/de-press-body- manifest/. 9 September 2019.
